TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ListChildrenAccessRule extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule

Docs.summary: The class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny an Active Directory Domain Services object the right to list child objects.

Docs.param: An object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified identity reference and access control type.

Docs.param: An object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information.
